forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 59. South southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 57 overnight. South southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
The weather in Downtown San Francisco unfolds today under a shroud of rain and relentless clouds, embodying the heart of winter's embrace. The air hangs heavy with anticipation, as the sky weeps, painting the streets in glistening hues of gray. With gusty winds pushing through at a brisk pace, one can feel the chill weaving its way into every crevice, urging you to cocoon yourself in layers of warmth. The day is draped in fog, muting the outlines of familiar landmarks, leaving the Golden Gate Bridge a distant whisper, half-hidden in the mist of the marine layer.

As the day marches forward, the rain persists, promising a comforting rhythm that complements the evening. This is not a day meant for grand outdoor escapades; instead, it beckons you to seek solace indoors. A cozy café might hold the perfect refuge, where you can savor a warm drink and watch life pass by through fogged windows. Alternatively, consider immersing yourself in a good book at home, wrapped in a blanket, letting the sound of rain become a soundtrack for reflection. Embrace the need for a sturdy umbrella and perhaps waterproof boots, for the journey outside will demand protection against the elements. Enjoy the tranquil beauty of this wet day, for it possesses its own quiet charm.
